dea.spamRescue
Class GenStats

java.lang.Object
  dea.spamRescue.GenStats
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDebugLevels
public class GenStats
extends Object
implements IDebugLevels

A utility for creating stats pages from DB data.
Rev 1.4 Add more control flags.
Rev 1.3 Add report by octet.
Rev 1.2 Add filter for entries where count is 0.
Rev 1.1 Add top domains page.

Author:
David Abigt

topOct

public void topOct(Connection cConnection)
Gen stats page that sums offences by first 3 octets of IP ordered by count and filtered to show only those where count > minTop. and or Gen stats page that sums offences by first 3 octets of IP ordered by last rec date and filtered to show only those where count > minTop. depending on parms

Parameters:
cConnection -
